segments.text: Excuse me.May I see the manager of your store ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am the manager.Can I help you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , great , I saw a job ad outside your store . I am interested in the job advertised . I am coming to see if there is any opportunity available for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right.Take a seat , please.Would you like to be a shop assistant or a cashier ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can do the work of shop assistant and I worked part time in a small department store during my summer vocation last year .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So now do you want a full-time job or part-time job ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: At present , both are OK for me.What do you need most , then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now we really need some part-time workers.You see , our full-time staff knocks off at five pm , but now we hope to extend the hours to eight pm.We need some part-time shop assistants to work 3 hours a day from five pm to eight pm.But I am not sure if you are qualified for the job.Since most of our customers are foreign , competence of good communication in English is necessary here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I can . I have been learning English for almost 5 years and especially I am fluent at speaking English.Also , I have made some foreigners friends during the experience of learning English .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is fine . I think you have the qualifications needed for the job , so I will let you have the job.Does the work schedule suit you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It quite suits me . I am free in the evening these days , I will have no difficulty starting at five pm .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good.There is only thing to be settled.Ten RIB an hour is the maximum we can pay you.Is the rate of pay acceptable to you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It seems reasonable.By the way , I can get my earning raised with a excellent performance , can't I ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure.You will get more if you can invite more customers with your good service .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . I will try my best to do the job well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That is good of you to say so.When can you start working ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ok.Let ' s make is next Monday . I n the end , you need to fill out the application form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you for your kindness , ma'am . See you next Monday .
segments.speaker: S1
